sentence.Network_en: In the meantime the war of nerves seems likely to continue.
sentence.Network_cn: 与此同时，心理战似乎还可能继续。

sentence.Network_en: I'll contact them soon. Meantime don't tell them I'm back.
sentence.Network_cn: 我会尽快和他们联系。在此期间，不要告诉他们我回来了。

sentence.Network_en: Meantime he was loading the pistols.
sentence.Network_cn: 而同时他在往手枪里装子弹.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as a noun): from mean + time

entry.def: In the meantime or meantime means in the period of time between two events.

example.ex: Eventually your child will leave home to lead her own life as a fully independent adult, but in the meantime she relies on your support...
example.tran: 你的孩子最终将长大成人，完全独立，离开家过自己的生活，不过在此期间她会靠你帮助。

example.ex: It now hopes to hold elections in February. Meantime, the state will continue to be run from Delhi.
example.tran: 现在有望在2月进行选举。在此期间，该邦继续由德里政府管理。

entry.def: For the meantime means for a period of time from now until something else happens.

example.ex: The Prime Minister has, for the meantime, seen off the challenge of the opposition...
example.tran: 首相目前已经经受住了反对派的挑战。

example.ex: For the meantime, the opinion polls have to be taken on trust.
example.tran: 眼下必须相信民意调查。

sentences.sentence: "meanwhile I will not think about the problem"
"meantime he was attentive to his other interests"
"in the meantime the police were notified"
